staxel.village.character.dialogue.RowanF: (안함)I've already taught you how to make ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop;!
(안함)Don't expect to learn any more of my secrets.
(안함)Just so you know, I will never tell you what the ^c:d03e37;secret ingredient^c:pop; is...
(안함)Even if I've told you how to make ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop;, that's as far as it goes...
